sentences.english: Zhu Ziqing used analogy much more, but preferred the use of female images.
sentences.chinese: 朱自清用喻較多，而且偏好對女性意象的使用。

sentences.english: So it proves that his prose of the earlier stage had become writings of benevolence.
sentences.chinese: 由此觀之，朱自清的早期散文，已然爲仁者之文。

sentences.english: Zhu Ziqing would rather starve to death than accept the Americans' flour.
sentences.chinese: 朱自清寧願餓死也不要美國人的麪粉。

sentences.english: Zhu Ziqing was deeply influenced by Chinese traditional thought.
sentences.chinese: 朱自清一生深受中國傳統思想的影響。

sentences.english: This is a systematic conclusion of ZHU Zi-qing's theory of appreciation of Chinese classic literature works.
sentences.chinese: 這是朱自清對古典文學欣賞理論的系統總結。

sentences.english: Zhu Ziqing's The Sight of Father's Back is one of the most famous essays in China.
sentences.chinese: 朱自清的代表作《背影》堪稱散文界的抒情名篇。

sentences.english: His posthumous work was compiled by Zhu Ziqing as The Collection of Wen Yiduo(four volumes).
sentences.chinese: 遺著由朱自清編成《聞一多全集》四卷。

sentences.english: Zhu Ziqing is a famous Chinese educationist in the early 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 朱自清是我國二十世紀前期著名的語文教育家。
